description: Their most technical running shorts. Lightweight with bonded seams, a 5’’ inseam and five pockets for storage, they’re built for longer days in the mountains or on your favorite backyard linkups, when utility matters.
name: Patagonia Strider Pro Shorts, 5" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: 2.5-oz 90% Prevented Ocean Plastic™ recycled polyester certiﬁed by OceanCycle and sourced from coastal communities at risk of plastic pollution
2.3-oz 100% recycled polyester double knit with miDori™ bioSoft for added wicking and softness, and HeiQ® Pure odor control
